      Constructor for trade offer
      Parameters:
      asset - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The ID of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The ID of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected

    • getPriceMatchedOffer

      public int getPriceMatchedOffer()
      Takes the matching sell offers and finds the lowest priced sell offer which is equally or lower priced than the buy offer. If two sell offers are equally priced, the offer placed first has priority (this will be the offer queried first)
      Specified by:
      getPriceMatchedOffer in class Offer
      Returns:
      int of the sell offer

      ACTUAL FUNCTION FOR RESOLVING OFFERS While there is a matching sell offer and the buy offer has not been resolved Perform a trade between a matching sell offer and buy offer

      java.lang.Exception
